feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Build a CI/CD Pipeline for AKS Apps by Using Azure Pipelines
entry.summary: Learn how to build a CI/CD pipeline for AKS apps by using Azure Pipelines, with integrated testing, staging, and production deployment.

entry.title: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines With Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a high-bandwidth, low-latency solution for SQL Server workloads. Use Azure NetApp Files for enterprise-scale performance and reduced costs.

entry.title: Replicate and Sync Mainframe Data to Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to replicate data while you modernize mainframe and midrange systems. Sync on-premises data with Azure data during modernization.

entry.title: Online Transaction Processing (OLTP)
entry.summary: Learn about atomicity, consistency, and other features of online transaction processing (OLTP), which manages transactional data while supporting querying.

entry.title: Build a Multiple-Agent Workflow Automation Solution with Semantic Kernel
entry.summary: Learn how to design scalable automation pipelines where multiple AI agents collaborate by using Semantic Kernel and Azure Container Apps for enterprise-grade tasks.

entry.title: AI Agent Orchestration Patterns
entry.summary: Learn about fundamental orchestration patterns for AI agent architectures, including sequential, concurrent, group chat, handoff, and magentic patterns.

entry.title: Use Azure Key Vault in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Key Vault in multitenant solutions, including isolation models, tenant-specific vaults, shared vaults, and multitenancy features.

entry.title: Design a Microservices Architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design and build a microservices architecture on Azure by following a reference implementation that illustrates best practices.

entry.title: Understand Data Models
entry.summary: Learn how to evaluate Azure data store models based on workload patterns, scale, consistency, and governance to guide service selection.

entry.title: Prepare to Choose a Data Store in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to choose the right Azure data store for your workloads by evaluating functional, performance, cost, and security requirements.

entry.title: N-tier Architecture Style
entry.summary: Learn about the benefits, challenges, and best practices for N-tier architectures on Azure, which separates an app into logical layers and physical tiers.

entry.title: Azure Sandbox
entry.summary: Accelerate your Azure project by using a fully functional sandbox environment that includes virtual networks, virtual machines, and databases.

entry.summary: Learn how to use an Azure Red Hat OpenShift landing zone to create secure, resilient, and compliant solutions in a hybrid cloud environment.

entry.title: WordPress on Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: Use Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) to deploy a highly scalable and secure installation of WordPress for large, storage-intensive applications.

entry.summary: Learn how to use AI and machine learning to forecast a customer's future order quantity for a specific SKU. See the Azure services that you can use in this solution.

entry.summary: Learn how to load data on demand into a cache, which can improve performance and maintain consistency between cached data and the underlying data store.

entry.summary: A discussion of how best to configure your environment for Windows Server Update Services (WSUS).

entry.summary: Learn about a scalable, secure AKS microservices architecture that builds on recommended AKS microservices baseline architectures and implementations.

entry.summary: Learn how to build an Azure system that serves web and non-web workloads with resilient multi-tier applications in multiple Azure regions.

entry.title: Load Balancing Options
entry.summary: Learn about Azure load balancing services and considerations to select one for distributing traffic across multiple computing resources.

entry.title: Azure Private Link in a Hub-and-Spoke Network
entry.summary: Use Azure Private Link to access PaaS services from a hub-and-spoke network. Connect to these services by using a private IP address from your virtual network.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure API Management to implement a JavaScript single-page application that doesn't store tokens in the browser session or local storage.

entry.summary: Learn how to organize your Azure resources in a multitenant solution based on tenant isolation and scaling out across multiple resources.

entry.summary: Protect web apps by implementing Zero Trust security in virtual networks. Use Azure Firewall and Azure Application Gateway in networks to maximize protection.

entry.summary: Learn about microservices on Azure. This architectural style builds applications that are resilient, highly scalable, and independently deployable.

entry.summary: This article describes the considerations that you need to give to domain names when you build multitenant web applications.

entry.summary: This article describes the different stages of a tenant life cycle and considerations for each stage, such as scaling and updates.

entry.summary: Learn how to build a simple system to generate documents. It combines retrieval, summarization, and generation to support faster document drafting by using AI.

entry.summary: Learn about fundamental orchestration patterns for AI agent architectures, including sequential, concurrent, group chat, handoff, and magentic patterns.

entry.summary: Compare the compute services in Azure and AWS. Explore the differences in virtual machines, containers, and serverless technologies.

entry.summary: Compare messaging service differences between Azure and AWS. Know Azure equivalents for Simple Email Service, Simple Queue Service, and messaging components.

entry.summary: Compare the networking options of Azure and AWS. The comparisons cover cloud virtual networking, cross-premises connectivity, DNS management, and more.

entry.summary: Learn about automated and user-managed business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) methods for Azure Data Factory and Azure Synapse Analytics pipelines.

entry.summary: Learn how to create a separate Active Directory domain in Azure that domains in your on-premises Active Directory forest trust.

entry.summary: Implement a secure hybrid network architecture with Active Directory Federation Services authorization and identity federation in Azure.

entry.summary: Learn how to implement a secure hybrid network architecture that integrates on-premises Active Directory domains with Microsoft Entra ID.

entry.summary: Explore recommended strategies for hosting Java applications to Azure, including platform types and supportability.

entry.summary: This article shows a domain-driven approach to designing microservices so that each service follows the general rule of doing just one thing.

entry.summary: Learn how to start from a carefully designed domain model to determine the right size for a microservice.

entry.summary: Learn how to scale out your Azure IoT Hub-based solution by using a scale-out pattern model, such as low-touch or zero-touch, to support millions of devices.

entry.summary: Use this baseline reference architecture to learn how to build network-secured, highly available, and zone-redundant enterprise chat applications by using Azure AI Foundry, the Azure AI Agent Service, Azure OpenAI models, and Azure App Service.

entry.summary: Learn about governance and compliance approaches for multitenant solutions, including data sovereignty, access control, and regulatory standards.
